definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Trucks are bringing fresh fruit and vegetables into the city.
sentences.chinese: 卡车把新颖地生果和蔬菜运进都会。

sentences.english: A truck rear-end our van on the freeway.
sentences.chinese: 在告诉公路上一辆卡车从后面撞上我们的休旅车。

sentences.english: His job was to drive a Red Cross truck carrying wounded away from battle.
sentences.chinese: 他在红十字会的工作是驾驶卡车，将伤患带离战场。

sentences.english: The truck was freighted with commercial goods.
sentences.chinese: 这辆卡车上装满了商品。

sentences.english: Look, the moving van is backing into their driveway.
sentences.chinese: 你看，运家具的大卡车正在往他们家的车道上倒车呢。

sentences.english: In the beginning the training sessions were held at Volvo Trucks dealerships on Saturdays.
sentences.chinese: 最初的培训课程由沃尔沃卡车公司安排在周日进行。

sentences.english: The truck backed up to the hole and dumped the trash In it.
sentences.chinese: 卡车倒开到洞边，将垃圾倒进洞里。

sentences.english: My father has a diesel-engined truck.
sentences.chinese: 我爸爸有一辆柴油引擎的卡车。

sentences.english: Glass and a Half Full Productions, home of Cadbury Dairy Milk, the gorilla and trucks.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃和半饱制作，吉百利牛奶，大猩猩和卡车回家。

sentences.english: I figured instead of killing other people, I’d just put the truck in the ditch.
sentences.chinese: 我在想的是为了避免别人送命，我得将卡车开向路堤。

sentences.english: The truck came coughing up the road.
sentences.chinese: 卡车沿著公路噗哧噗哧地开过来。

sentences.english: When we were an agrarian nation, all cars were trucks.
sentences.chinese: 在我们是农业国家的时候，所有的车子都是卡车。

sentences.english: Peng Shuilin had half of his body amputated after being run over by a truck.
sentences.chinese: 彭水林被一辆卡车辗过，一半身体被截肢后。

sentences.english: A truck brings in a delivery in through a wide, slow-moving gate.
sentences.chinese: 一辆卡车通过一扇宽阔的缓慢开启的大门运送物资。

sentences.english: The repairman apologized and threwthe bike in the back of his truck.
sentences.chinese: 修理工到了歉，把自行车放到卡车后面。

sentences.english: We had not gone far before we saw the road blocked by a truck.
sentences.chinese: 我们还没走多远就看见路被一辆卡车挡住了。

definition: heavy truck (abbr. for 重型卡車|重型卡车)
